data.title: Airstrike time delay should be standardized
data.body:
I think the amount of time you have to wait between ordering an airstrike and watching the bombs fall should be standardized, instead of depending on map size. On bigger maps, you have to wait a long time. The time depends also on which direction the planes come from, so it's highly variable. Given that players now receive a warning for airstrikes, I think it makes sense to have a standardized time delay (somewhere between 4-8 seconds).

If people don't like the idea of "planes spawning in the middle of the map", perhaps they could be made to look like they just descended from a higher altitude, and now are coming into view. 
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1498292-airstrike-time-delay-should-be-standardized?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: CNC chinook takes forever to land and unload
data.body: It turns forward to land, meaning that you get a massive overhead in landing time. This is more than enough for that rocket trooper to go from killing it after it has landed to dying in mid air and losing several hundred credits

data.title: CNC AI can ion cannon stealthed units
CNC nuke nerfed beyond uselessness
data.body: It can no longer destroy a weapons factory, adv. powerplant or an agt at the edge of the "crater"

data.title: Cannot select fire on enemy APC
data.body: Nor does force fire work. This made me lose a game because there is no such thing as priority >_>

data.title: Pillboxes have missing production tooltip descriptions
Camo pillbox remain invisible even while firing
data.body:
Enemy pillboxes will not be revealed while firing. 

This is because garrisoned units are the one firing, and not the structures themselves.

data.title: Shrapnel
data.body: Adds shrapnel to buildings in d2k.

data.title: Replay Viewer : switch view to teammate base
data.body:
Currently in the Replay Viewer, if you watch a 1v1, you can switch views after selecting Player1 then EasyAI. The view moves from one base to the other one.

But if you play a 2v1 (for example), the view can't be switched from Player1 to Player2 (if they are in the same team).

data.title: Shortened map titles and author credits to combat overflow
data.body: This does only change the metadata header of the maps, nothings else. It was annoying in the map chooser. Maybe in the future we should character limit those fields.

data.title: Reduced player numbers in Dune 2000 maps with too few space to build
data.body:
First I thought about removing them completely, but then: we don't really have alternatives so I re-arranged spawn points and drastically reduced player numbers.

What mappers tend to forget: you need space to build on rock and while decorations are nice: they block cells. Tech buildings are large and this is not "Trike Rush 2000" anymore. I won't accept patches that try to remove building bibs or cut off some extra cells from buildings. Instead badly designed maps will get thrown out now.

data.title: Renamed old system.yaml descendened files
data.body: I thought about better more descriptive names. Followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4430

data.title: Order lines jitter on and off.
data.body: If you give units an AttackMove order and they are clumped up in their destinations (say 5 inf in a cell) the orderlines will flicker. I'm not sure at the moment on how to fix this.

data.title: Packaged the modchooser
data.body: forgotten in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4953

data.title: Restore old defence range values.
data.body: #4724 may have been a bit too extreme. This reverts the range changes, while keeping the other nerfs.

data.title: Removed duplicated main menu layout from Dune 2000
data.body: separated from https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4496

data.title: Wall concrete fix
Add some decorations to the disabled D2K shellmap.
Wall and D2K turret polish
data.body:
![20140405-d2k](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/167819/2621984/f097dcbc-bc82-11e3-980a-4d274e2159a1.png)

This extends RenderBuildingWall to multiple actor types, and updates adjacency when a neighbour is destroyed or sold.  The D2K turrets now integrate with neighbouring walls, and have fixed muzzle flashes and firing offsets.

data.title: Turrets don't visually link to walls
Walls can't be built on concrete.
Tech building ideas
data.body:
Some ideas:
- When you have captured a tech hospital your inf should have a little icon in the selection box to indicate they are being healed by the hospital (i swear this was in ra2 couldn't find a picture)
- Capturable Biolab makes inf immune to tiberium perhaps? not even sure what the biolab does at the moment couldn't find it in the YAML either.

data.title: Fix some AttackMedic/mech bugs/regressions
Mechanic and medic don't auto-heal while guarding
data.body: If a mechanic or medic is given the order to guard a unit using the d key, they no longer auto-heal units around them. This would be the whole purpose of using guard move for mechanics and medics. They would heal units in the middle of battle and it would be easier to manage them.
